nodes.text: An Akul-tooth headdress was a type of headdress worn by Togruta.
The headdress was worn on the forehead and glued on the head and extended around the eye patches of the Togruta. The headdress incorporated pearls, metals, and stones, along with the teeth of akul.
The headdress was sported by males and females who had slain an akul by themselves. The Jedi Master Shaak Ti and Padawan Ahsoka Tano were known for wearing their headdress with their Jedi apparel.
